title: Set Up Equation For the Given Condition
text: Let $$x=$$ pesos that is equivalent to 450 US dollars. We can translate into a proportion pesos/US dollar=pesos/US dollar which gives $$\frac{12.29}{1}=\frac{x}{450}$$.

title: Solve Equation
text: Solve for $$\frac{12.29}{1}=\frac{x}{450}$$. What is x? We can isolate x by multiplying 450 both sides. It gives $$x=5530.5$$ as the final answer. Therefore, Maurice will get 5530.5 pesos for his trip.
